roleset.name: natural disaster: burning wild land

example.name: wildfire-n: with arg1
example.text: An F18 Hornet taking off while a large grass wildfire was burning near the East Runway.

example.name: wildfire-n: arg2
example.text: yons and Larimer County fire crews are responding to a one-acre wildfire near Pinewood Reservoir in south Larimer County

roleset.note: WILDFIRE-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to bushfire, brushfire, fire-n.02. (from wildfire.01-n)
The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.
